articles.title: 2021's first supermoon, the 'Pink Moon,' will rise on Tuesday. It won't be pink. - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Supermoons are rare full moons that occur when the moon is the closest it can get to Earth. According to NASA, there will be two supermoons in 2021.
articles.content:
The first supermoon of the year will happen Monday, appearing up to 30% brighter and 14% bigger than a typical full moon.
